changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Stay updated with our latest features, improvements, bug fixes, and security updates

items: Added independent output language selection feature to the story generator
Support for 12 major languages: English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Hindi, and Italian
Language selector positioned below the "Quick adds" section with intuitive flag emojis and bilingual display
Users can choose story output language different from the website interface language
Complete multilingual translation support covering all interface texts
Optimized API parameter passing with new outputLanguage field
Improved state management to avoid closure issues
Enhanced type safety by extending TypeScript type definitions
Maintained consistency with existing design system
Fixed language switcher using incorrect router causing language state loss
Language toggle component now uses next-intl's i18n-aware router, ensuring language state persists after switching languages and clicking any links
Added story showcase page to display AI-generated story examples
Implemented full internationalization support (Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, German)

Added complete Changelog module with timeline-style display, version tracking, update categorization (features/fixes/improvements/security), multi-language support, and added entries in Footer and Sitemap
Fixed language switching issue where some pages remained in English
Fixed UI text internationalization on story detail pages
Improved page loading performance with static generation
Enhanced mobile responsive layout experience
Launched core AI story generation feature
Support for multiple story formats: short, medium, long
Support for various genres: fantasy, sci-fi, romance, mystery, adventure, etc.
Multiple narrative perspective options: first-person, third-person, etc.
Customizable target audience and emotional tone
Enhanced AI generation quality for more coherent story plots
Improved user interface for a more intuitive story generation process
Official website launch
Completed basic page framework setup
Integrated Next.js 15 and latest technology stack
Implemented user authentication system (Google OAuth support)
Deployed to production environment
Implemented security verification mechanisms
Added HTTPS support
Configured CSP security policy
